title: Spy Guy

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Slingshot**: Astrally attack someone with a slingshot, pick one of Killing, Protective, Investigative or Support/Other, abilities that fit the specified category used by/on the target for this night and the next one will fail.
- **Hammer**: Attack someone with a hammer, visits on them will fail, but they will be told a Spy Guy attacked their target.

fields.name: Attribute:
fields.value:
- The first time you would die by an attack, your abilities permanently become charged, dealing Powerful attacks instead.
- Cannot use the same ability twice in a row.

desc:
